articles.description: The stock declined around 22.6 percent in past five trading sessions. At 11 am on March 15, the stock was trading at Rs 7,540.15 on BSE. Year to date, it has gained over 76 percent.

articles.title: Bankers In India To Get Higher Salary Increases Than Singapore, Hong Kong - NDTV
articles.description: Finance professionals in India are in line for higher salary hikes than those in Hong Kong and Singapore this year, underscoring how firms are tapping the nation's economic boom as China slows, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.

articles.title: Jeep to launch Hyundai Creta rival in India - CarWale
articles.description: Jeep India is working on bringing a new compact SUV to rival the likes of the Hyundai Creta, Kia Seltos, and other SUVs in the sub-Rs. 20 lakh space. This all-new SUV will sit below the Compass and will be based on the Citroen C3 Aircross.
articles.content:
• To be priced around Rs. 15 lakh to Rs. 18 lakh
